name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven DevOps Engineer with 9+ years of extensive experience in implementing CI/CD pipelines and optimizing cloud services on **AWS**. Proficient in automating deployment processes using tools such as **GitHub Actions**, **Bitbucket**, and **AWS CodeBuild**, while leveraging **Java**, **C#**, and **Python** across diverse environments. Deep knowledge of **Linux**, networking protocols including **TCP/IP** and **HTTP**, and compliance standards like **ISO27001** and **Soc2**. Proven ability to enhance collaboration across teams to drive continuous improvement in application delivery. Original strengths include a solid foundation in **microservices architecture**, adeptness in both backend frameworks, and hands-on experience with **Redis**, **Apache Kafka**, and **RabbitMQ**, ensuring robust and efficient application solutions.
